Although feeble, they can deal significant amounts of [[poison]] and non-elemental damage with their magic. ==Spells== {{Spellcaster |number= |slot1=[[Venom Bolt]] (3d12) |slot2=[[Poison Arrow]] (3d14) |slot3=''none'' |slot4=[[Localized Ignite Poison]] |slot5=''none'' |slot6=''none'' }} {{clear}} ==Tips & Tricks== *Don't let the name fool you into thinking them harmless. Poison resistance will help lessen the impact of their [[Poison Magic]] spells, but [[Stone Arrow]] stings no matter what. ==History== Formicid venom mages were considered for inclusion in [[0.14]] but were considered not sufficiently interesting and were removed shortly before the release.
